ProjectTitle: Rapid Assessment of Multicomponent Diffusion and Adsorption in Nanoporous Materials (RADIAN)
InitialFeedbackHistory:
17/06/2024
Please note that you used an old FWO DMP template; since 2022 FWO expects DMPs to follow the Flemish Standard DMP template. You can find this template in DMPonline.be, or on the FWO website with more information about the FWO DMP requirements (https://www.fwo.be/en/about-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan-dmp/).

Storage: which cloud storage will you use? The storage guide can help you decide: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: peer reviewed journal publications are not in the scope of a DMP, note that Scientific data is a journal, which complements public data repositories. Please describe in this section if and which data you will share and where; for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing

13/06/2024
You now submitted the RDM section from your application; at this stage of your project FWO expects a more detailed DMP using the Flemish standard DMP template. You can find the template together with the FWO regulations at https://www.fwo.be/en/about-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan-dmp/; you can also find the template with guidance for each question in www.dmponline.be For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance
label: good with suggestions
